snippet.title: The Beasties: Hello World Gameplay Trailer (Virtual Pet for iOS)
snippet.description:
See The Beasties of The Beasties: Hello World in action! Watch as they run, jump, play, speak and dress-up.

Find out more: http://MyBeasties.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/TheBeastiesGame
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheBeastiesGame

The Beasties is the most advanced, the most awesome, the most adorable virtual pet game in existence. Take care of whimsical creatures that learn more the longer they survive. Teach The Beasties tricks or teach them words it by speaking into the microphone! Choose from four unique Beasties and watch what they'll do next!

The Beasties are the best virtual pet anyone could ever ask for. With moves like Justin Beiber (or PSY of Gangham Style fame) and a voices like Adele, these Beasties can do it all. Ok, maybe they have their own Beastie way of singing and dancing but they believe they are superstars. 

Teach them things like how to talk! "Good" can become "Epic" or "Bad" can be "Fail." There are dozens of things a Beastie can say that you record into your iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch/Android Device microphone. 

Want to customize your Beastie? Dress them up in hats, glasses, shoes, earring and more! Lady Gaga herself would be impressed with all the costume options a Beastie has access to.
